name: Hunter Hunter
description:
Hunter Hunter is the first symmetrical horror game that is similar to a racing game. It applies the concept of queue where the last hunter hunting a person while the person hunting another person towards the head of the queue. All of them are however trapped in an arena. Only 1 survivor who collected all lights from the other hunters may escape or all be killed by the actual (AI controlled) hunter that hunts from the tail of the queue.

Single player is also available to uncover the story of people who fell under one of the 7 great sins. It starts with Greed.

State:
Currently in DEMO/PROTOTYPE version.
